text_block_list.text: At last, it's time for Sakura Bakushin O to enter her "Make Debut."

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: First of all, I'd like to make a flawless debut, so everyone――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …That's what I want to make them say!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And so, Sakura Bakushin O makes her spectacular Make Debut!
